duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and oversee Systems Engineering Managers to support Systems Engineers in driving growth within Major Accounts.
Participate in technical pre-sales operations and achieve revenue generation, individual, team, and organizational quotas.
Interact at a senior level with customers and partners, providing valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, technical evolutions, and business changes.
Develop and own outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives that drive pipeline and sales, and lead portfolio expansion initiatives.
Ensure effective account planning is executed to deliver compelling business-focused solutions, develop and maintain strong relationships with partners, and support account management.
Report and make visible the successes and deficiencies of initiatives, manage evaluations, and act as an escalation point for technical issues.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line, Systems Engineering management experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Computer Science or a related technical field (Master's preferred)
